entities.name: bathilda
entities.description: Bathilda is introduced as a character who shuffles past Harry and Hermione. She is described as pushing Hermione aside.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a character who is being pushed aside by Bathilda. She expresses concern about the situation.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who reassures Hermione and leads her into the sitting room.

entities.name: muriel
entities.description: Muriel is mentioned by Harry as someone who called Bathilda 'gaga'. No further information about Muriel is provided.

relationships.description: Harry reassures Hermione that everything will be okay.
Bathilda is near Harry, as she calls out to him from the next room.
